verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> A Song מִ֝זְמוֹר <WH4210> [and] Psalm לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> for the sons קֹֽרַח׃ <WH7141> of Korah גָּ֘ד֤וֹל <WH1419> Great יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> [is] the LORD וּמְהֻלָּ֣ל <WH1984> to be praised מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> and greatly בְּעִ֥יר <WH5892> in the city אֱ֝לֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> of our God הַר־ <WH2022> [in] the mountain קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> of his holiness

יְפֵ֥ה <WH3303> Beautiful נוֹף֮ <WH5131> for situation מְשׂ֪וֹשׂ <WH4885> the joy כָּל־ <WH3605> of the whole הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ <WH776> of the whole earth הַר־ <WH2022> [is] mount צִ֭יּוֹן <WH6726> Zion יַרְכְּתֵ֣י <WH3411> [on] the sides צָפ֑וֹן <WH6828> of the north קִ֝רְיַ֗ת <WH7151> the city מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> King רָֽב׃ <WH7227> of the great
אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> God בְּאַרְמְנוֹתֶ֗יהָ <WH759> in her palaces נוֹדַ֥ע <WH3045> is known לְמִשְׂגָּֽב׃ <WH4869> for a refuge
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> lo הַ֭מְּלָכִים <WH4428> For lo the kings נֽוֹעֲד֑וּ <WH3259> were assembled עָבְר֥וּ <WH5674> they passed by יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> together
הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> They רָ֭אוּ <WH7200> They saw כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> then תָּמָ֑הוּ <WH8539> [it and] so they marvelled נִבְהֲל֥וּ <WH926> they were troubled נֶחְפָּֽזוּ׃ <WH2648> [and] hasted away
רְ֭עָדָה <WH7461> Fear אֲחָזָ֣תַם <WH270> took hold שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there חִ֝֗יל <WH2427> upon them there [and] pain כַּיּוֹלֵֽדָה׃ <WH3205> as of a woman in travail
בְּר֥וּחַ <WH7307> wind קָדִ֑ים <WH6921> with an east תְּ֝שַׁבֵּ֗ר <WH7665> Thou breakest אֳנִיּ֥וֹת <WH591> the ships תַּרְשִֽׁישׁ׃ <WH8659> of Tarshish

כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> we שָׁמַ֨עְנוּ ׀ <WH8085> As we have heard כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> so רָאִ֗ינוּ <WH7200> so have we seen בְּעִיר־ <WH5892> in the city יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God צְ֭בָאוֹת <WH6635> of hosts בְּעִ֣יר <WH5892> in the city אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> of our God אֱלֹ֘הִ֤ים <WH430> God יְכוֹנְנֶ֖הָ <WH3559> will establish עַד־ <WH5704> it for עוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> ever סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah
דִּמִּ֣ינוּ <WH1819> We have thought אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> O God חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> of thy lovingkindness בְּ֝קֶ֗רֶב <WH7130> in the midst הֵיכָלֶֽךָ׃ <WH1964> of thy temple

כְּשִׁמְךָ֤ <WH8034> According to thy name אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> O God כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> So תְּ֭הִלָּתְךָ <WH8416> so [is] thy praise עַל־ <WH5921> unto קַצְוֵי־ <WH7099> unto the ends אֶ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth צֶ֝֗דֶק <WH6664> of righteousness מָלְאָ֥ה <WH4390> is full יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <WH3225> thy right hand

יִשְׂמַ֤ח ׀ <WH8055> rejoice הַר־ <WH2022> Let mount צִיּ֗וֹן <WH6726> Zion תָּ֭גֵלְנָה <WH1523> be glad בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> let the daughters יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah לְ֝מַ֗עַן <WH4616> Because מִשְׁפָּטֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4941> because of thy judgments
סֹ֣בּוּ <WH5437> Walk about צִ֭יּוֹן <WH6726> Zion וְהַקִּיפ֑וּהָ <WH5362> and go round about סִ֝פְר֗וּ <WH5608> her tell מִגְדָּלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH4026> the towers

שִׁ֤יתוּ <WH7896> Mark לִבְּכֶ֨ם ׀ <WH3820> ye well לְֽחֵילָ֗ה <WH2430> her bulwarks פַּסְּג֥וּ <WH6448> consider אַרְמְנוֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH759> her palaces לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> that תְּ֝סַפְּר֗וּ <WH5608> that ye may tell לְד֣וֹר <WH1755> [it] to the generation אַחֲרֽוֹן׃ <WH314> following

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For זֶ֨ה ׀ <WH2088> such אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> For this God אֱ֭לֹהֵינוּ <WH430> [is] our God עוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> for ever וָעֶ֑ד <WH5703> and ever ה֖וּא <WH1931> He יְנַהֲגֵ֣נוּ <WH5090> he will be our guide עַל־ <WH5921> until מֽוּת׃ <WH4192> [even] unto death
